title: Online Collaborative Language Learning Project

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Utilizing a platform enabling real-time collaboration in smartphone-based VR simulation environments. Requires small team formation among learners

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate peer feedback and collaborative document-writing skills through three or more online collaborative activities
Learners can conduct 10+ minute conversations in a target language (selected language) using role allocation and communication strategies in VR simulation environments
Learners can document the process of resolving technical/communication issues arising during collaborative learning in two or more methods

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
